name: The Goyim Know Dark (DailyStormer BBS)
description: Dark theme for thegoyimknow.to. This is just quick and dirty, something I add onto as I notice things that annoy me.
additional_info: 2018-01-04: changed scrollbar hover/active + fixed invisible dropdown entries 2017-12-09: changed scrollbar Should also work for bbs.dstormer6em3i4km.onion, but due to some oddity (probably a bug) it doesn't want to accept the onion domain. I've thus added a regex match, but not tested its validity. Feel free to drop me a message if it doesn't work.
